thread.title: BRIEF-BWXT Awarded CA$18.6 Million Contract for Nuclear Power Plant Tube Fabrication

title: BRIEF-BWXT Awarded CA$18.6 Million Contract for Nuclear Power Plant Tube Fabrication

organizations.name: nuclear power plant tube fabrication february

text:
February 2, 2018 / 3:42 PM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-BWXT Awarded CA$18.6 Million Contract for Nuclear Power Plant Tube Fabrication Reuters Staff 
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Bwx Technologies Inc: 
* BWXT AWARDED CA$18.6 MILLION CONTRACT FOR NUCLEAR POWER PLANT TUBE FABRICATION 
* SUNIT BWXT NUCLEAR ENERGY CANADA HAS BEEN AWARDED A CA$18.6 MILLION, FOUR-YEAR CONTRACT TO MANUFACTURE ZIRCALOY-4 SEAMLESS TUBESâ€‹ 
* AWARDED CONTRACT TO MANUFACTURE ZIRCALOY-4 SEAMLESS TUBES FOR SOCIETATEA NATIONALA NUCLEARELECTRICA SA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
